sourcesContent: import NumberInput from '@components/number-input' import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody, CardText, Label } from 'reactstrap' const NumberInputStep = () => { return ( Step The default step increment is 1, and can be changed via the step prop (decimal values allowed). When step is set, the value will always be a multiple of the step size plus the minimum value. ) } export default NumberInputStep
